text: is a Japanese long-distance runner who specialized in the marathon. He finished twelfth at the 1995 World Championships in 2:17:30 hours. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1995 |World Championships |Gothenburg, Sweden |12th |Marathon |2:17:30 |} ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male long- distance runners Category:Japanese male marathon runners
